entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Papineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:58 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 9:00 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.3 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 97 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: N 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Freezing drizzle. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Freezing drizzle mixed with light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 8. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 8:35 PM EST Tuesday 17 January 2023
